Package trust_system_lib

Interface Summary
TrustAlg The TrustAlg interface specifies those methods which any class implementing a trust management system must include.
 

Class Summary
EigenTM The EigenTM class conforms to the TrustAlg interface and implements the EigenTrust algorithm as described by Hector Garcia-molina, et.
EtIncTM The EtIncTM class conforms to the TrustAlg interface and is nearly identical to the implementation of EigenTM.
NoneTM The NoneTM class conforms to the TrustAlg interface and simulates the lack of a TM system.
Opinion The Opinion class implements Subjective Logic opinions.
TnaSlTM The TnaSlTM class conforms to the TrustAlg interface and implements the 'Trust Network Analysis with Subjective Logic' approach of Josang et.
